H0.text: what currency should you take to morocco. Euro

H1.text: what currency should you take to morocco. US Dollar

H2.text: what currency should you take to morocco. British Pound

H3.text: what currency should you take to morocco. Moroccan dirham

A4.text: The Moroccan dirham is the official monetary currency of Morocco.

A5.text: The Moroccan dirham is also accepted in trade markets in Ceuta, although the euro is the sole legal tender there.
